participant_1.background:
I live in a small town in the Midwest with my dog, Petrucci.
I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
I read horror novels in secret so my parents don't worry about me.
I'm a person who's trying to stay positive despite my recent financial hardships.

My current weight is a secret
I have a pet cat who loves to nap on my bed.
i sell paper products for a living.
i love my pet dog more than anything.
i am a fisherman.

content.text: Hi there, I'm participant_1, what's your name?
Hello, I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too. What do you do for a living?
I sell paper products. What about you?
I'm a wedding planner.
Oh that sounds exciting! Do you enjoy it?
I do, it's very rewarding. I love helping couples plan their special day.
That's great! What's your favorite part about your job?
I love getting to know the couples and helping them create the perfect wedding for them.
That's so sweet. What's the most challenging part of your job?
The most challenging part is dealing with the stress of wedding planning.
I can imagine! But I'm sure it's worth it in the end.
It is! I love seeing the couples so happy on their wedding day.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I do. What about you, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my pets. I have a cat and a dog.
Aww, that sounds lovely. I love animals too.
Me too! They're so cute and cuddly.
I agree! What are their names?
My cat's name is Mittens and my dog's name is Buddy.
Those are great names! I love them.
